ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a 24-year-old full-stack developer with a passion for both front-end and back-end technologies. With a background as a self-employed VFX Artist/Cutter/Graphic Designer, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise.
ABOUT.COLLABORATION: Let's collaborate and build something truly remarkable together!

SKILLSET.DESCRIPTION: I have extensive knowledge in both front-end and back-end technologies, blending creative design with technical expertise.

CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT ME
CONTACT.HEADING: Ready to work together?
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I am convinced that I can help you with your projects and that I am a perfect fit for your team. With extensive experience in both front-end and back-end technologies as well as a solid background in design and multimedia production, I bring a unique blend of creativity and technical expertise. Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!
CONTACT.INVITE: If I have piqued your interest, I would be delighted if you contact me.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTENT:
We place great importance on protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy. This portfolio website is solely intended to showcase our work and to provide you with the opportunity to get in touch with us via the contact form.

Through the contact form, we only collect the information that you voluntarily provide, such as your name, email address, and your message. We use this information exclusively for processing your inquiry and further communication. No additional use or disclosure to third parties will take place unless we are legally obliged to do so or it is necessary to fulfill your request.

Since we do not use cookies or other tracking technologies, no automated data collection takes place. All the information you provide is processed manually and only for the purpose for which it was submitted.

Your data will be stored only for as long as it is necessary to process your inquiry or as required by statutory retention periods. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

You have the right at any time to request information about the data we have stored about you, as well as to request its correction, deletion, or restriction of processing. Should you have any questions or concerns regarding data protection, please do not hesitate to contact us using the provided contact details.

By using our website and submitting an inquiry via the contact form, you agree to this method of data processing. We regularly update this Privacy Policy to comply with legal requirements and to further enhance the security of your data.
